verses.verse: וּבַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> u-va-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I And in the seventh בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ko-desh ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dah no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; ye shall do י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom it is a day תְּרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah of blowing יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh have לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD פַּ֧ר <WH6499> par bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the first בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> ba-Kar young אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one אַ֣יִל <WH352> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah [and] seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> te-mi-Mim. without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> lap-Par, for a bullock שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֖ים <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> la-'A-yil. for a ram

וְעִשָּׂר֣וֹן <WH6241> ve-'is-sa-Ron tenth deal אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, And one לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad; for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <WH7651> le-shiv-'At throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> hak-ke-va-Sim. lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> le-chap-Per to make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem. and

מִלְּבַד֩ <WH905> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֨ת <WH5930> 'o-Lat Beside the burnt offering הַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh of the month וּמִנְחָתָ֗הּ <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tah, and his meat offering וְעֹלַ֤ת <WH5930> ve-'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid and the daily וּמִנְחָתָ֔הּ <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tah, and his meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH5262> ve-nis-kei-Hem and their drink offerings כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <WH4941> ke-mish-pa-Tam; according unto their manner לְרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach, for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD ס sa-Mek

וּבֶעָשׂוֹר֩ <WH6218> u-ve-'a-sOr And ye shall have on the tenth לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I [day] of this seventh הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, of this מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ko-desh an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <WH6031> ve-'in-ni-Tem and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> naf-sho-tei-Chem; your souls כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> me-la-Chah any work לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su. ye shall not do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Tem But ye shall offer עֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach, [for] a sweet פַּ֧ר <WH6499> par bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of the first בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> ba-Kar young אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one אַ֣יִל <WH352> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; one כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <WH3532> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- old שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah year שִׁבְעָ֔ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah, [and] seven תְּמִימִ֖ם <WH8549> te-mi-Mim they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu having לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> lap-Par, to a bullock שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> she-Nei [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim, tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> la-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad. to one

עִשָּׂרוֹן֙ <WH6241> 'is-sa-rOn A several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> is-sa-Ron, A tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad; for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <WH7651> le-shiv-'At throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> hak-ke-va-Sim. lambs

שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad One חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַ֞ד <WH905> mil-le-Vad alone חַטַּ֤את <WH2403> chat-Tat beside the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִים֙ <WH3725> hak-kip-pu-Rim of atonement וְעֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> ve-'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid, and the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tah and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> ve-nis-kei-Hem. of it and their drink offerings פ Peh

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה֩ <WH2568> u-va-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen י֜וֹם <WH3117> Yom day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, of the seventh מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ko-desh ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dah no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; ye shall do וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <WH2287> ve-chag-go-Tem and ye shall keep חַ֛ג <WH2282> chag a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. days

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Tem And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah a burnt offering אִשֵּׁ֨ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֛ר <WH1241> va-Kar bull שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> 'ei-Lim rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim; two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen תְּמִימִ֥ם <WH8549> te-mi-Mim they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> yih-Yu. and their grain

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> lap-Par bullock הָֽאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, unto every לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> lish-lo-Shah three עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten פָּרִ֔ים <WH6499> pa-Rim, bullocks שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> she-Nei two עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לָאַ֣יִל <WH352> la-'A-yil ram הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, to each לִשְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> lish-Nei of the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <WH352> ha-'ei-Lim. rams

וְעִשָּׂרׅוֹן֙ <WH6241> ve-'is-sa-rOn And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> is-sa-Ron, tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad; to each לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> le-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen כְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> ke-va-Sim. lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid, beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> min-cha-Tah his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> ve-nis-Kah. and his drink offering ס sa-Mek

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> u-vai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, And on the second פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֛ר <WH1241> va-Kar bull שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim two עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> 'ei-Lim rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim; two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> te-mi-Mim. without spot

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tam And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> ve-nis-kei-Hem and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> Lap-pa-rim for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> la-'ei-Lim for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> ve-lak-ke-va-Sim and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> be-mis-pa-Ram [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> kam-mish-Pat. after the manner

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid, beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> u-min-cha-Tah and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> ve-nis-kei-Hem. thereof and their drink offerings ס sa-Mek
